dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 10 classes of images, divided into two tasks, each containing 5 classes, used for evaluating online continual learning methods.
dcterms:title: Split CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 100 classes of images, organized into 10 tasks, each consisting of 10 classes, used for evaluating online continual learning methods.
dcterms:title: Split CIFAR100

dcterms:creator: Oriol Vinyals
Charles Blundell
Timothy Lillicrap
Daan Wierstra
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for one-shot learning, containing multiple classes of images, organized into tasks for evaluating online continual learning methods.
dcterms:title: Split MiniImageNet
